about_the_game:
Gymnast can’t wait to earn his superhero spandex. Until then, he remains just a sidekick.

Hoping to jump start his career, Gymnast finds a mysterious message online that could prove he’s ready for his promotion.

But tentacle wielding aliens with a taste for hot guys might be more than he can handle.

Read the adventures of the acrobatic sidekick before his role in Fresh Force Frustrations.
8 short stories of serialized superhero smut, telling of Gymnast's discovery, obsession, and obduction by horny tentacle aliens. Each story is filled with tentacles, bondage, and some alien-based MPREG for extra fun!

Includes all eight stories (40k+ words total), plus high-res covers, each with an NSFW version, and some bonus original artwork.

***

HOW TO ACCESS DLC FILES
DLC files found with in the game installation path
Once downloaded, you'll find this in the DLC of Fresh Force Frustrations in your Steam Library. Right-click the name of the game, click on Properties, then go to the Local Files tab, then click Browse Local Files. You'll find the DLC there.

Example file path: C:\Program Files (x86)\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\TheComingEndFreshForce

***


Gymnast #1: Tentacle Acrobatics
Tired of being just a sidekick, Gymnast needs a big case to earn his spandex. Mysterious messages on a dating app arouse Gymnast’s suspicions, leading him to a hidden laboratory where he discovers more of a challenge than he was expecting.


Gymnast #2: Tentacle Training
Gymnast can’t get the tentacle creature out of his mind. He’s messing up his superhero training while he fantasized about all those arms wrapped around him. He has to find a way to relieve himself of this distraction so he can focus on his dream of becoming a superhero.
Some obsessions aren’t that easy to get rid of.


Gymnast #3: Virtual Tentacles
Desperate to find the tentacle creature again, Gymnast searches the internet for leads, including the same dating website the creature lurked on before. A suspicious video chat leads Gymnast to a new world of virtual experiences, and he might never want to leave.


Gymnast #4: Tentacle CaptureGymnast sets out to find the tentacle creature and demand to know why it’s collecting hot men. But finding what he wants might be the last thing Gymnast needs.


Gymnast #5: Tentacle Temptation
Gymnast finds himself captive in a tiny cell, wearing only a skimpy speedo. There's no way to escape and nothing to do except...
He can't let himself give into temptation. If he does, the creature growing inside him will get stronger, and eventually get free. Gymnast resists any physical stimulation, until another hunky captive gets placed in the cell with him...


Gymnast #6: Tentacle Escape
Gymnast desperately needs to find a way to escape his captivity before he gives into his physical urges. His cellmate, Adam, is making everything harder. And that includes everything!
But escaping their cell doesn't mean they've found freedom. Their alien captors have more surprised planned!


Gymnast #7: Tentacle Takeover
The aliens are preparing to invade Earth, and they need the creature growing inside of Gymnast. This leader of the aliens will come out when Gymnast...finishes. And there are hundreds of tentacles swarming around him, ready to make sure he completes his role.
There's no where to run. No where to hide. Gymnast is in the clutches of the tentacles, and Earth is next!


Gymnast #8: Planet Tentacle
The aliens have absorbed Gymnast's cell mate and friend, and are ready to invade Earth. There are a dozen of other captive men, under the control of these tentacles. There's no help coming. No way to contact any real superheroes. Gymnast is the last man standing between these aliens and the complete invasion of the planet. But how long can he resist the temptation of those satisfying tentacles?

content_descriptors.notes:
Each ebook contains at least one sex scene, often involving tentacles, bondage, domination, and in later books, MPREG. These are text only, besides the covers, and describe these adult situations in words. Some of the tentacle scenes include non-consensual bondage, captivity, impregnation, and/or penetration. There is subtext of hypnosis within the stories, regarding the tentacles, that compels the main character to seek them out.

Moderate cartoon-style violence also happens, mostly from tentacle swipes and superhero acrobatics.

Book covers can be found with and without nudity, all including bondage involving tentacles, some with penetration, body absorption, and/or vore.
